name: Blessing Of Restoration
description: Slam your staff down to activate its blessings, healing you and your allies in front of you for 2970 Health.  Also grants Minor Resolve, increasing you and your allies' Physical Resistance and Spell Resistance by 2974 for 20 seconds.
effectLines: Increases the size, healing done, and duration.
coefDescription: Slam your staff down to activate its blessings, healing you and your allies in front of you for $1 Health.  Also grants Minor Resolve, increasing you and your allies' Physical Resistance and Spell Resistance by 2974 for 20 seconds.
rawDescription:
Slam your staff down to activate its blessings, healing you and your allies in front of you for <<1>> Health.

Also grants <<2>>, increasing you and your allies' Physical Resistance and Spell Resistance by <<3>> for <<4>>.
